verses.verse: הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold לְצֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> in righteousness יִמְלָךְ־ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Behold a king וּלְשָׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> and princes לְמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> in judgment יָשֹֽׂרוּ׃ <S%H8323><s%> shall rule

וְהָיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> become אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And a man כְּמַֽחֲבֵא־ <S%H4224><s%> shall be as an hiding place ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> from the wind וְסֵ֣תֶר <S%H5643><s%> and a covert זָ֑רֶם <S%H2230><s%> from the tempest כְּפַלְגֵי־ <S%H6388><s%> as rivers מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water בְּצָי֔וֹן <S%H6724><s%> in a dry place כְּצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> as the shadow סֶֽלַע־ <S%H5553><s%> rock כָּבֵ֖ד <S%H3515><s%> of a great בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land עֲיֵפָֽה׃ <S%H5889><s%> in a weary

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׁעֶ֖ינָה <S%H8159><s%> shall not be dim עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> And the eyes רֹאִ֑ים <S%H7200><s%> of them that see וְאָזְנֵ֥י <S%H241><s%> and the ears שֹׁמְעִ֖ים <S%H8085><s%> of them that hear תִּקְשַֽׁבְנָה׃ <S%H7181><s%> shall hearken

וּלְבַ֥ב <S%H3824><s%> The heart נִמְהָרִ֖ים <S%H4116><s%> also of the rash יָבִ֣ין <S%H995><s%> shall understand לָדָ֑עַת <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge וּלְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> and the tongue עִלְּגִ֔ים <S%H5926><s%> of the stammerers תְּמַהֵ֖ר <S%H4116><s%> shall be ready לְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> to speak צָחֽוֹת׃ <S%H6703><s%> plainly

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יִקָּרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> shall be no more called ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer לְנָבָ֖ל <S%H5036><s%> The vile person נָדִ֑יב <S%H5081><s%> liberal וּלְכִילַ֕י <S%H3596><s%> nor the churl לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> No יֵֽאָמֵ֖ר <S%H559><s%> said שֽׁוֹעַ׃ <S%H7771><s%> [to be] bountiful

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For נָבָל֙ <S%H5036><s%> For the vile person נְבָלָ֣ה <S%H5039><s%> villany יְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> will speak וְלִבּ֖וֹ <S%H3820><s%> and his heart יַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> will work אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> iniquity לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to practise חֹ֗נֶף <S%H2612><s%> hypocrisy וּלְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> and to utter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God תּוֹעָ֔ה <S%H8442><s%> error לְהָרִיק֙ <S%H7324><s%> to make empty נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the soul רָעֵ֔ב <S%H7457><s%> of the hungry וּמַשְׁקֶ֥ה <S%H4945><s%> and he will cause the drink צָמֵ֖א <S%H6771><s%> of the thirsty יַחְסִֽיר׃ <S%H2637><s%> to fail

וְכֵלַ֖י <S%H3596><s%> also of the churl כֵּלָ֣יו <S%H3627><s%> The instruments רָעִ֑ים <S%H7451><s%> [are] evil ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he זִמּ֣וֹת <S%H2154><s%> wicked devices יָעָ֔ץ <S%H3289><s%> he deviseth לְחַבֵּ֤ל <S%H2254><s%> to destroy [עֲנָוִים כ] (עֲנִיִּים֙ <S%H6035><s%> humble ק) בְּאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> words שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> with lying וּבְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> speaketh אֶבְי֖וֹן <S%H34><s%> even when the needy מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> right

וְנָדִ֖יב <S%H5081><s%> But the liberal נְדִיב֣וֹת <S%H5081><s%> liberal things יָעָ֑ץ <S%H3289><s%> deviseth וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נְדִיב֥וֹת <S%H5081><s%> and by liberal things יָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> shall he stand פ

נָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> ye women שַֽׁאֲנַנּ֔וֹת <S%H7600><s%> that are at ease קֹ֖מְנָה <S%H6965><s%> Rise up שְׁמַ֣עְנָה <S%H8085><s%> hear קוֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> my voice בָּנוֹת֙ <S%H1323><s%> daughters בֹּֽטח֔וֹת <S%H982><s%> ye careless הַאְזֵ֖נָּה <S%H238><s%> give ear אִמְרָתִֽי׃ <S%H565><s%> unto my speech

יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> Many days עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Within שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> and years תִּרְגַּ֖זְנָה <S%H7264><s%> shall ye be troubled בֹּֽטְח֑וֹת <S%H982><s%> ye careless women כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for כָּלָ֣ה <S%H3615><s%> shall fail בָצִ֔יר <S%H1210><s%> for the vintage אֹ֖סֶף <S%H625><s%> the gathering בְּלִ֥י <S%H1097><s%> will not יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> shall not come

חִרְדוּ֙ <S%H2729><s%> Tremble שַֽׁאֲנַנּ֔וֹת <S%H7600><s%> ye women that are at ease רְגָ֖זָה <S%H7264><s%> be troubled בֹּֽטְח֑וֹת <S%H982><s%> ye careless ones פְּשֹׁ֣טָֽה <S%H6584><s%> strip וְעֹ֔רָה <S%H6209><s%> you and make you bare וַחֲג֖וֹרָה <S%H2296><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חֲלָצָֽיִם׃ <S%H2504><s%> [sackcloth] upon [your] loins

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שָׁדַ֖יִם <S%H7699><s%> for the teats סֹֽפְדִ֑ים <S%H5594><s%> They shall lament עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂדֵי־ <S%H7704><s%> fields חֶ֕מֶד <S%H2531><s%> for the pleasant עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and גֶּ֖פֶן <S%H1612><s%> vine פֹּרִיָּֽה׃ <S%H6509><s%> for the fruitful

עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> For אַדְמַ֣ת <S%H127><s%> Upon the land עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> of my people ק֥וֹץ <S%H6975><s%> thorns שָׁמִ֖יר <S%H8068><s%> [and] briers תַּֽעֲלֶ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come up כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> Yea עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all בָּתֵּ֣י <S%H1004><s%> yea upon all the houses מָשׂ֔וֹשׂ <S%H4885><s%> of joy קִרְיָ֖ה <S%H7151><s%> city עַלִּיזָֽה׃ <S%H5947><s%> [in] the joyous

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because אַרְמ֣וֹן <S%H759><s%> Because the palaces נֻטָּ֔שׁ <S%H5203><s%> shall be forsaken הֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> the multitude עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city עֻזָּ֑ב <S%H5800><s%> shall be left עֹ֣פֶל <S%H6076><s%> the forts וָבַ֜חַן <S%H975><s%> and towers הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> have become בְעַ֤ד <S%H1157><s%> about מְעָרוֹת֙ <S%H4631><s%> shall be for dens עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> ever מְשׂ֥וֹשׂ <S%H4885><s%> a joy פְּרָאִ֖ים <S%H6501><s%> of wild asses מִרְעֵ֥ה <S%H4829><s%> a pasture עֲדָרִֽים׃ <S%H5739><s%> of flocks

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until יֵ֨עָרֶ֥ה <S%H6168><s%> be poured עָלֵ֛ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Until the spirit מִמָּר֑וֹם <S%H4791><s%> upon us from on high וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> becomes מִדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> and the wilderness לַכַּרְמֶ֔ל <S%H3759><s%> be a fruitful field [וְכַרְמֶל כ] (וְהַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <S%H3759><s%> A fertile ק) לַיַּ֥עַר <S%H3293><s%> for a forest יֵחָשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H2803><s%> be counted

וְשָׁכַ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> Then judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> and righteousness בַּכַּרְמֶ֥ל <S%H3759><s%> in the fruitful field תֵּשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> remain

וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> And the work הַצְּדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> of righteousness שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> shall be peace וַֽעֲבֹדַת֙ <S%H5656><s%> and the effect הַצְּדָקָ֔ה <S%H6666><s%> of righteousness הַשְׁקֵ֥ט <S%H8252><s%> quietness וָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> and assurance עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

וְיָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> shall dwell עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> And my people בִּנְוֵ֣ה <S%H5116><s%> habitation שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in a peaceable וּֽבְמִשְׁכְּנוֹת֙ <S%H4908><s%> dwellings מִבְטַחִ֔ים <S%H4009><s%> and in sure וּבִמְנוּחֹ֖ת <S%H4496><s%> resting places שַׁאֲנַנּֽוֹת׃ <S%H7600><s%> and in quiet

וּבָרַ֖ד <S%H1258><s%> When it shall hail בְּרֶ֣דֶת <S%H3381><s%> coming down הַיָּ֑עַר <S%H3293><s%> on the forest וּבַשִּׁפְלָ֖ה <S%H8218><s%> in a low place תִּשְׁפַּ֥ל <S%H8213><s%> shall be low הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> and the city

אַשְׁרֵיכֶ֕ם <S%H835><s%> Blessed זֹרְעֵ֖י <S%H2232><s%> [are] ye that sow עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> beside all waters מְשַׁלְּחֵ֥י <S%H7971><s%> that send forth רֶֽגֶל־ <S%H7272><s%> [thither] the feet הַשּׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> of the ox וְהַחֲמֽוֹר׃ <S%H2543><s%> and the ass ס
